mosinstall.name: Slick RSS
mosinstall.author: David Thomas
mosinstall.description: Module to display up to 5 RSS feeds with mouseover tooltip teaser text

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

param.name: cache
param.label: Module Cache
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

param.name: rsscache
param.label: RSS Cache time
param.description: Set the cache time for the RSS feed(s)

param.name: rssurl1
param.label: RSS URL 1
param.description: Enter the URL of a RSS/RDF feed

param.name: rssurl2
param.label: RSS URL 2
param.description: (optional) Enter the URL of a second RSS/RDF feed

param.name: rssurl3
param.label: RSS URL 3
param.description: (optional) Enter the URL of a third RSS/RDF feed

param.name: rssurl4
param.label: RSS URL 4
param.description: (optional) Enter the URL of a fourth RSS/RDF feed

param.name: rssurl5
param.label: RSS URL 5
param.description: (optional) Enter the URL of a fifth RSS/RDF feed

param.name: rsstitle
param.label: Feed Title
param.description: Display news feed title

param.name: rssdesc
param.label: Feed Description
param.description: Show the description text for each news feed

param.name: rssimage
param.label: Feed Image
param.description: Show the image associated with each news feed

param.name: rssitems
param.label: Number of Items
param.description: Enter number of RSS items to display for each RSS feed

param.name: rssitemtitle_words
param.label: Item Title Word Count
param.description: Allows you to limit the amount of visible item title text. 0 will show all the text

param.name: rssitemdesc
param.label: Item Description Text
param.description: Show description text for each RSS item in the main list.

param.name: rssitemdesc_words
param.label: Item Description Word Count
param.description: Maximum number of words to display for each RSS item description. 0 will show all the text

param.name: rssitemdesc_images
param.label: Item Description Text Images
param.description: Allow images in the item description text in the main list.

param.name: @spacer
param.label: Tooltip Settings
param.description: The settings below are related to the mouseover tooltip

param.name: enable_tooltip
param.label: Enable Tooltip
param.description: Show item description in mouseover tooltip? e.g this one!

param.name: t_word_count_title
param.label: Tooltip Title Word Count
param.description: Allows you to limit the amount of visible item title text in the tooltip. 0 will show all the text

param.name: t_word_count_desc
param.label: Tooltip Description Word Count
param.description: Allows you to limit the amount of visible item description text in the tooltip. 0 will show all the text

param.name: tooltip_desc_images
param.label: Tooltip Description Text Images
param.description: Allow images in the tooltip description text

param.name: tooltip_bgcolor
param.label: Tooltip Caption Background Color
param.description: Color of tooltip caption background and border in hexidecimal notation e.g. #24537d

param.name: tooltip_capcolor
param.label: Tooltip Caption Font Color
param.description: Color of tooltip caption font in hexidecimal notation e.g. #ffffff

param.name: tooltip_fgcolor
param.label: Tooltip Body Background Color
param.description: Color of tooltip body background in hexidecimal notation e.g. #E1F0FF

param.name: tooltip_textcolor
param.label: Tooltip Body Font Color
param.description: Color of tooltip body font in hexidecimal notation e.g. #000000

param.name: tooltip_border
param.label: Tooltip Border Width
param.description: Width of tooltip border in pixels e.g 2

param.name: tooltip_extra_invocation_string
param.label: Extra Tooltip Parameters
param.description: (Advanced) Extra parameters to use when creating tooltip, for more options, see http://www.bosrup.com/web/overlib/?Command_Reference
